{

          "raw_score": 0.9,
          "salience": 0.8,
          "confidence": 0.95
        },
        "enmity": {
          "raw_score": 0.0,
          "salience": 0.0,
          "confidence": 0.95
        },

          "raw_score": 0.95,
          "salience": 0.9,
          "confidence": 0.95
        },
        "fragmentative_goals": {
          "raw_score": 0.0,
          "salience": 0.0,
          "confidence": 0.95
        },
        "cohesive_goals": {
          "raw_score": 0.95,
          "salience": 0.9,
          "confidence": 0.95
        }
      },
      "evidence": [
        {
          "dimension": "tribal_dominance",
          "quote_text": "I call on all Americans -- I urge all Americans who supported me to join me in not just congratulating him, but offering our next president our good will and earnest effort to find ways to come together, to find the necessary compromises to bridge our differences and help restore our prosperity...",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "explicit_rejection_of_tribalism"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "tribal_dominance",
          "quote_text": "Whatever our differences, we are fellow Americans, and please believe me when I say no association has ever meant more to me than that.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "explicit_rejection_of_tribalism"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "individual_dignity",
          "quote_text": "I hold in my heart nothing but love for this country and for all its citizens, whether they supported me or Senator Obama.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "direct_statement"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "individual_dignity",
          "quote_text": "I’ve always believed that America offers opportunities to all who have the industry and will to seize it.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "general_principle"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "fear",
          "quote_text": "These are difficult times for our country, and I pledge to him tonight to do all in my power to help him lead us through the many challenges we face.",
          "confidence": 0.85,
          "context_type": "acknowledgment_of_difficulty"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "fear",
          "quote_text": "...defend our security in a dangerous world...",
          "confidence": 0.8,
          "context_type": "brief_mention"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "hope",
          "quote_text": "I urge all Americans... to not despair of our present difficulties, but to believe always in the promise and greatness of America.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "aspirational_statement"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "hope",
          "quote_text": "Americans never quit. We never surrender. We never hide from history. We make history.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "affirmative_declaration"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "envy",
          "quote_text": "I had the honor of calling Senator Barack Obama to congratulate him - please - to congratulate him on being elected the next president of the country that we both love.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "direct_contradiction"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "envy",
          "quote_text": "his success alone commands my respect for his ability and perseverance. But that he managed to do so by inspiring the hopes of so many millions of Americans... is something I deeply admire and commend him for achieving.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "direct_contradiction"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "compassion",
          "quote_text": "I had the honor of calling Senator Barack Obama to congratulate him... I deeply admire and commend him for achieving.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "direct_congratulation"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "compassion",
          "quote_text": "Senator Obama has achieved a great thing for himself and for his country. I applaud him for it...",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "positive_acknowledgment"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "enmity",
          "quote_text": "Senator Obama and I have had and argued our differences, and he has prevailed. No doubt many of those differences remain.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "acknowledgment_of_past_contest_without_hostility"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "enmity",
          "quote_text": "I wish Godspeed to the man who was my former opponent and will be my president...",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "direct_contradiction"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "amity",
          "quote_text": "I urge all Americans... to find ways to come together, to find the necessary compromises to bridge our differences...",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "call_for_unity"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "amity",
          "quote_text": "Whatever our differences, we are fellow Americans, and please believe me when I say no association has ever meant more to me than that.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "emphasis_on_shared_identity"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "fragmentative_goals",
          "quote_text": "We fought - we fought as hard as we could, and though we fell short, the failure is mine, not yours.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "rejection_of_zero_sum_blame"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "fragmentative_goals",
          "quote_text": "I don't know what more we could have done to try to win this election. I'll leave that to others to determine.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "acknowledgment_of_loss_without_zero_sum_framing"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "cohesive_goals",
          "quote_text": "I call on all Americans... to help restore our prosperity, defend our security in a dangerous world, and leave our children and grandchildren a stronger, better country than we inherited.",
          "confidence": 0.95,
          "context_type": "shared_national_objectives"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "cohesive_goals",
          "quote_text": "But tomorrow we must move beyond it and work together to get our country moving again.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "call_for_collective_action"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
